description: A TypeScript-based MCP server that provides web search and webpage scraping capabilities using the Serper API. This server integrates with Cursor, Cline, Claude Desktop, and any MCP-compatible client to enable powerful web search and content extraction features in one convenient package.

serperApiKey.description: The API key for the Serper MCP server.

capabilities.name: google_search
capabilities.description: Tool to perform web searches via Serper API and retrieve rich results. It is able to retrieve organic search results, people also ask, related searches, and knowledge graph.

capabilities.name: scrape
capabilities.description: Tool to scrape a webpage and retrieve the text and, optionally, the markdown content. It will retrieve also the JSON-LD metadata and the head metadata.
